body_html: Any news on this? When I load variables from the saver they are not recognized by tf.get_variable, which creates a new variable with the same name plus '_1'. How can I get the reference to the variables loaded from the saver?
body_text: Any news on this? When I load variables from the saver they are not recognized by tf.get_variable, which creates a new variable with the same name plus '_1'. How can I get the reference to the variables loaded from the saver?
body: Any news on this? When I load variables from the saver they are not recognized by tf.get_variable, which creates a new variable with the same name plus '_1'. How can I get the reference to the variables loaded from the saver?
